resources.string:
Hi, I'm Matrix.

This app 'Color Guessing Game', is a simple game which allows you to guess color names.

It gives 20 colors for the round, you need to guess the color names.

For each correct guess, you are rewarded with 5 points.


Serial no: 40
Date of creation: 5 June 2022
Contact us: matrixinventions@gmail.com
